channel.title: Process-PK | Beta
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zLf76.png[/img]
[B]Links:[/B] [url=http://process-pk.com]Website[/url] | [url=http://process-pk.com/forums/misc.php?page=webclient]Webclient[/url] | [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/36288851/Process-PK%20Desktop%20Client.rar]Download Client[/url]
[B]Information:[/B] Process-PK is owned and operated by Dan. I've spent countless amount of hours working on the server to make sure everything is near perfection. I'm hoping that all problems are at a minimum so players can have a fun and enjoyable experience. The main skills are all functional, I'm currently working on construction and making hunter more realistic. I would really appericate it if you gave it ago, I'm hoping that Process-PK will grow and be in the top 50 servers at least, sometime in the future.[/CENTER]
[B]Forum Features:[/B]
[ul][li]Reliable and fast web hosting.[/li] [li]MyBB Forums.[/li] [li]Updated frequently.[/li] [li]Easy to use.[/li] [li]Friendly staff and community.[/li] [li]Registered domain.[/li] [li]Clean and tidy.[/li][/ul]
[B]Server Features:[/B]
[ul][li]Functional magics.[/li] [li]Near-perfect combat.[/li] [li]Bug free mini-games.[/li] [li]Great training facilities.[/li] [li]Various PKing teleports.[/li] [li]All skills functional.[/li] [li]Realistic economy.[/li] [li]Active and friendly staff.[/li] [li]Items on death interface.[/li] [li]Curses working.[/li] [li]Working hand cannon w/ special.[/li] [li]Working EXP counter.[/li] [li]Auto donation system.[/li] [li]Vote for rewards system.[/li] [li]Player and NPC clipping in most regions.[/li] [li]Flawless switching.[/li] [li]New combat icons.[/li] [li]New hitmarks.[/li][/ul]
And more.
[CENTER][B]Media:[/B]
Map data fixed. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img89/3959/imagekwqf.png[/img] Agility. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img585/460/hi2k.png[/img] Mining. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/8346/hi3.png[/img] Smithing. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/4272/hi10.png[/img] Woodcutting. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img90/5558/hi4.png[/img] Firemaking. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img821/1060/hi5z.png[/img] Fishing. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img717/7552/hi6u.png[/img] Cooking. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img846/816/hi7.png[/img] Fletching. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img3/9716/hi8r.png[/img] Crafting. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img28/6362/hi11.png[/img] Farming. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img196/5175/hi9v.png[/img] Nicely laid out home. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img90/6614/shopu.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Process-PK | Beta
item.dc:creator: @Script Script`
item.description:
@Script wrote:

Bump,

[ul][]Firemaking re-done (Clipped, can’t light fire on fire, correct anims etc.).
[]Woodcutting re-done (No delay between tree & stump, correct animations, hatchets etc.).
[]Fishing edited, I’ve fixed the majority of the problems with it.
[]Resting has been temp disabled due to the run / rest bug.
[]Blow kiss animation has been temp disabled until I find a fix for it. It’s un-needed in most cases so it doesn’t really matter.
[]Hunter removed as it’s useless.
[]Server crashing, the random retarded error in the run.bat has been fixed.
[]Most NPC’s now have the correct attack, death & block emote.
[]General store added to home and thieving prices have been lowered so the eco isn’t ruined, despite still being in BETA.
[]Donator benefits have increased, our current donators are going to be amazed with the new and unique donator zone & shop.
[*]Voting store has been re-vamped and has better and more useful stuff in it. Also automatic voting has been added, you’ll be able to vote for your points + 2M.[/ul]

Read full topic
